script.name: setup.plugin.T2
script.sourceplaintext:
$T2.PageID=8370 load text: id=$T2.PageID
$cmd=COMMAND_TYPE_TRADE_58 $T2.Config=get global variable: name='wwsl.T2.global' if notis datatype[ $T2.Config ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $T2.Config=array alloc: size=0 set global variable: name='wwsl.T2.global' value=$T2.Config end resize array $T2.Config to 9 * Configuration: * 0 - Version * 1 - Hotkey ID * 2 - Array of Program -> Ship index * 3 - Global menu opened? * 4 - Debug options. See subsystem codes below: * 1 - enable navigator logging * 2 - enable setup/update logging * 4 - enable additional debug actions/options * 8 - enable trade logging * 16 - enable contragent validation logging * 32 - enable logging of signal handling * 64 - enable logging of function calls * 128 - enable combat message logging * 5 - Array of exclude patterns of name for ship searching * 6 - Last ship number * 7 - Period to clean log (days) * 8 - Log was cleared last time (seconds)
if$uninstall gosub Uninstall else gosub Install end return [TRUE]
Update.Program2Ship: $Dummy.TopCache=array alloc: size=0 @ $Dummy.Index=[THIS] -> call script wwsl.T2.function0 : #Fn=51 while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=array alloc: size=0 append $Dummy to array $Dummy.TopCache end * Build cache $Dummy.List= get ship array: of race Player class/type=null $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.List while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$Dummy.List[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy2=$Dummy -> get local variable: name='wwsl.T2.config' skip ifis datatype[ $Dummy2 ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY continue $Dummy.Program=$Dummy2[1] $Dummy.Cache=$Dummy.TopCache[$Dummy.Program] append $Dummy to array $Dummy.Cache end $T2.Config[2] = $Dummy.TopCache $Dummy.Flags=$T2.Config[4] skip if2 & $Dummy.Flags endsub $Dummy.Index=size of array $Dummy.TopCache write to log file #$T2.PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt='Total programs: %s', $Dummy.Index, null, null, null, null while$Dummy.Index > 0 dec $Dummy.Index= $Dummy=$Dummy.TopCache[$Dummy.Index] $Dummy=size of array $Dummy write to log file #$T2.PageID append=[TRUE] printf: fmt=' Program #%s cache size: %s', $Dummy.Index, $Dummy, null, null, null end endsub
Install: gosub Install.CheckVersion gosub Install.CheckConfig gosub Update.Program2Ship gosub Install.Cmd gosub Install.Hotkey endsub
Uninstall: gosub Stop.Ships gosub Uninstall.Cmd gosub Uninstall.Hotkey gosub Clear.GlobalVars endsub
Stop.Ships: * TODO: endsub
Install.CheckConfig: $Dummy=$T2.Config[4] skip ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_INT $T2.Config[4] = 0 $Dummy=$T2.Config[5] if notis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $Dummy=array alloc: size=0 $T2.Config[5] = $Dummy end $Dummy=$T2.Config[6] if notis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_INT $Dummy=get global variable: name='wwsl.T2.LastShipNumber' if$Dummy set global variable: name='wwsl.T2.LastShipNumber' value=null else $Dummy=0 end $T2.Config[6] = $Dummy end $Dummy=$T2.Config[7] skip ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_INT $T2.Config[7] = 3 $Dummy=$T2.Config[8] skip ifis datatype[ $Dummy ] == DATATYPE_INT $T2.Config[8] = 0 endsub
Install.CheckVersion: $Dummy=$T2.Config[0] skip if$Dummy == '3.01' $T2.Config[0] = '3.01' endsub
Install.Cmd: set script command upgrade: command=$cmd upgrade=[TRUE] set ship command preload script: command=$cmd script=wwsl.T2.shipmenu global script map: set: key=$cmd, class=Корабль, race=Player, script=wwsl.T2.run, prio=0 endsub
Uninstall.Cmd: global script map: remove: key=$cmd, class=Корабль, race=Player endsub
Install.Hotkey: if not$T2.Config[1] $Dummy=read text: page=$T2.PageID id=999 $Dummy=register hotkey $Dummy to call script wwsl.T2.globalmenu $T2.Config[1] = $Dummy end endsub
Uninstall.Hotkey: $Dummy=$T2.Config[1] if$Dummy unregister hotkey $Dummy $T2.Config[1] = null end endsub
Clear.GlobalVars: set global variable: name='wwsl.T2.LastShipNumber' value=null set global variable: name='wwsl.T2.global' value=null endsub
return null

comment.var: 4 - Debug options. See subsystem codes below:
5 - Array of exclude patterns of name for ship searching

line.text: set ship command preload script: command=

sval.val: 4 - Debug options. See subsystem codes below:
5 - Array of exclude patterns of name for ship searching
